title: Need For Speed Rivals Repack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB

Description:
Welcome to the Redvers area! Here unfolds uncompromising confrontation between desperate street racers and severe guardians of the law. At the disposal of both - the best machines and the latest technology. Both are willing to do anything to get around opponents. Join the fight! Take a chance and do not trust anyone!

Racers powerful tuned cars - lone wolves, ready to do anything for fame. Police officers also work together and use all available means to drive reckless in the corner. Change the way when you want! And do not forget to raise rates with the new scoring system, using cumulative Speed Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Points, to get even more valuable rewards.
New All-Drive system blurs the line between single-player and multiplayer. No expectations in the lobby! You can immediately enter into a world where the line is already rushing your friends. And every moment of this crazy race is unique!
Your car - your personality. Bring the power of the iron horse to the limit, using new parts and technologies. Give your car a unique look - at your disposal a variety of stylish colors, emblems, license plates, wheels and stickers. Keep the coolest configuration and choose the appropriate option when you want.
Chase became more fun, and as fugitives and pursuers may use different types and modifications. Streetracers possible means to help get away from the chase - from devices to create interference to electromagnetic pulse generator. Police armed with too many useful devices and methods to detain offenders - in particular, acoustic guns, roadblocks and helicopters. Whichever side you choose, the use of advanced technology to beat rivals!
